item.title: 新加坡房屋销售因项目需求疲软而下降
item.description: 新加坡的新房销售量在短暂飙升后出现下滑，表明该国一度繁荣的房地产市场情绪脆弱。【原文：Sales of new homes in Singapore fell after a brief surge, in a sign of fragile sentiment in the nation’s once-booming property market.】

item.title: 印度最大的影院运营商希望放映 T20 板球世界杯，因为电影令人失望
item.description: 在电影票房持续低迷的情况下，印度最大的影院运营商正在讨论在国际板球理事会男子 T20 世界杯期间放映重要比赛，以吸引观众。【原文：India’s largest cinema operator is in discussions to screen key matches during the International Cricket Council Men’s T20 World Cup, in a bid to lure patrons as movies continue to struggle at the box office.】

item.title: 日本央行本周意外削减购债规模，引发加息押注
item.description: 日本央行在本周的例行操作中意外减少了债券购买量，投资者因此加大了对日本央行在 7 月前加息的押注。【原文：Investors have boosted bets for an interest-rate hike by the Bank of Japan by July following an unexpected reduction in its bond buying during a regular operation this week.】

item.title: 当法国谈论采取行动的必要性时，德国悄然进入状态
item.description:
马克龙的宏伟计划和对肖尔茨的嘲讽掩盖了一个事实：在法国原地踏步之际，柏林正在加紧参与乌克兰事务。【原文：

Macron’s grand plans and jabs at Scholz obscure the fact that Berlin is stepping up its engagement for Ukraine as France stands still.

】

item.title: 美国通胀数据显示美联储向正确方向迈出一小步
item.description: 预测人员预计，美国消费者物价月度报告将显示，通胀压力在今年年初连续三次低于预期之后，在 4 月份有所缓和。【原文：Forecasters expect a monthly report on US consumer prices to show inflationary pressures moderated in April after three straight worse-than-anticipated readings to start the year.】

item.title: 中国考虑由政府购买未售出房屋以缓解供应过剩问题
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，中国正在考虑一项提案，让全国各地的地方政府购买数百万套未售出的住房，这将是中国为挽救陷入困境的房地产市场而做出的最雄心勃勃的尝试之一。【原文：China is considering a proposal to have local governments across the country buy millions of unsold homes, people familiar with the matter said, in what would be one of its most ambitious attempts yet to salvage the beleaguered property market.】

item.title: 世界铝价飙升，中国进口俄罗斯铝暂时受阻
item.description: 中国买家暂时回避俄罗斯铝，因为商业现实阻碍了双边贸易关系的深化。【原文：Chinese buyers are temporarily shunning Russian aluminum, as commercial realities intrude on the push to deepen bilateral trade ties.】

item.title: 中国人民银行推出政策性贷款，关注经济增长和货币问题
item.description: 中国央行以相同的借贷成本延长了关键政策贷款的期限，这表明央行有意在不增加人民币压力的情况下帮助刚刚起步的经济复苏。【原文：China’s central bank extended a key policy loan at the same borrowing cost, signaling an intention to aid a nascent economic recovery without adding pressure on the yuan.】

item.title: 美联储施密德称利率可能在 "一段时间 "内保持高位
item.description: 堪萨斯城联邦储备银行行长杰弗里-施密德（Jeffrey Schmid）表示，利率可能会在 "一段时间内 "保持高位，因为政策制定者正在等待物价压力正在缓解的证据。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Kansas City President Jeffrey Schmid said interest rates could remain high “for some time” as policymakers await evidence that price pressures are easing.】

item.title: 索尼业绩超预期并回购股票，股价最高上涨 10
item.description: 在《圣斗士星矢 2》等游戏的帮助下，索尼集团 3 月份季度净利润超过预期，股价创下约 18 个月以来的最大涨幅。【原文：Sony Group Corp.’s stock surged its most in about 18 months after games like Helldivers 2 helped lift net income past estimates during the March quarter.】

item.title: 顶级中国股票基金青睐消费类和受气候影响股票而非蒸馏器类股票
item.description: AllianceBernstein 认为，考虑到相对估值和疲软的经济，中国的消费股和受气候变化影响的股票将比白酒酿造企业等股票带来更好的回报。【原文：China’s consumer and climate change-affected stocks will offer better returns than the likes of baijiu distillers given relative valuations and the weak economy, according to AllianceBernstein.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好。中国抨击美国的最新关税举措，美联储主席敦促保持耐心，高盛集团的约翰-沃尔德伦（John Waldron）发出警告。以下是市场动态。【原文：Good morning. China blasts America’s latest tariff move, the Fed Chair urges patience and Goldman’s John Waldron has a warning. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Isabelle Lee】

item.title: 美国库存下降，石油供应成为焦点，石油价格上扬
item.description: 在一份行业报告显示美国库存缩减后，石油价格上涨，交易商们期待着国际能源机构的报告，该报告可能会揭示下半年的市场平衡情况。【原文：Oil advanced after an industry report showed shrinking US stockpiles, and traders looked ahead to a report from the International Energy Agency that may shed light on market balances into the second half.】

item.title: 前简街交易员在保密反诉中称薪酬被拖欠
item.description: 两名前 Jane Street Group 交易员被指控为 Millennium Management 公司窃取了印度期权交易策略，他们对原公司提起反诉，称离开公司是因为对 2023 年的薪酬待遇感到失望。【原文：The two former Jane Street Group traders accused of stealing an Indian options-trading strategy for Millennium Management countersued their old firm, saying they left because they were disappointed in their 2023 pay packages.】

item.title: 亚洲股市跟随美国股市反弹，关注 CPI：市场综述
item.description: 亚洲股市准备追随以科技股为首的美国股市大涨，因为投资者期待周三晚些时候的关键通胀数据为美联储的下一步行动提供线索。【原文：Stocks in Asia are poised to follow a big tech-led rally in US benchmarks, as investors look to key inflation data later Wednesday for clues on the Federal Reserve’s next steps.】

item.title: 通胀放缓，阿根廷第六次降息至 40
item.description: 阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱周二第六次下调基准利率，因为阿根廷政府认为通胀率正在走低，同时正在缩减中央银行的资产负债表。【原文：Argentina cut its benchmark interest rate Tuesday for a sixth time under President Javier Milei as his government sees inflation edging lower while it shrinks the central bank’s balance sheet.】

item.title: 创纪录的股息和回购成为日本股票的支撑点
item.description: 日本公司以创纪录的速度增加股息和股票回购，为濒临调整的市场提供了支持。【原文：Japanese companies are increasing dividends and share buybacks at a record pace, providing support to a market that was on the verge of a correction.】

item.title: Blackstone 和高盛在 9 亿美元私人贷款中压低了竞争对手的价格
item.description: 据知情人士透露，黑石集团 (Blackstone Inc.) 和高盛资产管理公司 (Goldman Sachs Asset Management) 将为 Depot Connect International 提供约 9 亿美元直接贷款中的最大部分，以帮助该公司对更昂贵的私人债务进行再融资。【原文：Blackstone Inc. and Goldman Sachs Asset Management are providing the biggest portions of a roughly $900 million direct loan to Depot Connect International as it refinances more expensive private debt, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 英国亿万富翁乔-刘易斯的飞行员承认逃税罪
item.description: 英国商人乔-刘易斯（Joe Lewis）的一名私人飞行员在卷入涉及其亿万富翁老板的内幕交易案后，承认犯有逃税罪。【原文：A private pilot for UK businessman Joe Lewis pleaded guilty to tax evasion after being swept up in an insider trading case involving his billionaire boss.】

item.title: 巴西国家石油公司不排除收购 Braskem 股份以拯救公司的可能性
item.description: 如果巴西国家石油公司（Petrobras）的石化产品生产商面临业绩下滑的风险，该公司不排除收购 Braskem 公司多数股权的可能性。【原文：Petrobras isn’t ruling out buying a majority stake in Braskem if the petrochemicals producer is at risk of deterioration.】

item.title: 交易员为后CPI上涨做准备，目标美国10年期收益率为4.3
item.description: 美国国债期权交易员们认为，在周三公布重要的通胀数据后，债券将反弹，收益率将大幅下降。【原文：Traders in US Treasury options are positioning for a bond rally and sharp drop in yields in the aftermath of crucial inflation data to be released on Wednesday.】

item.title: 比尔-格罗斯出售 GameStop 和 AMC 期权，在 "备忘录狂热 "中套现
item.description: 昔日的 "邦德之王 "正在成为期权之王？【原文：Is the erstwhile “Bond King” becoming the options king?】

item.title: 麦当劳自 2017 年以来首次出售枫叶债券
item.description: 麦当劳公司（McDonald's Corp.）自 2017 年以来首次出售加元债券，加入了一连串在市场上借款以分散货币风险的美国公司的行列。【原文：McDonald’s Corp. sold Canadian dollar bonds for the first time since 2017, joining a string of US companies that have been borrowing in the market to diversify their currency exposure.】

item.title: 高盛的科斯汀说，S&P 500 指数在年底前不会有什么大的变化
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：The S&P 500 Index is unlikely to deliver any more gains from now through the end of the year, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc.’s David Kostin.】

item.title: 亚洲大视野：印度莫迪既受欢迎又两极分化 (播客)
item.description: 来源：彭博社来源：彭博社，17:41【原文：Source: Bloomberg, 17:41】

item.title: 中型 IPO 是美国市场反弹中缺失的一环
item.description: 美国首次公开募股市场正在复苏，交易量同比增长，市场情绪也在改善。然而，持续上升的一个关键因素却明显缺失：中型交易。【原文：The recovery in the US initial public offerings market is underway, with deal volumes growing year-on-year and sentiment improving. Yet one key element of an enduring upswing is noticeably absent: mid-sized deals.】

item.title: 美国通胀数据公布后，交易员已做好美元下跌的准备
item.description: 在周三公布关键的美国通胀报告后，货币交易员们正在为美元下跌做准备。【原文：Currency traders are girding for a drop in the dollar in the wake of Wednesday’s key US inflation report.】

item.title: 华尔街赌场开门营业，流行语股票占领市场
item.description: 周二，在周三关键的通胀数据公布之前，股市交易时段昏昏欲睡。但在投资界较为隐蔽、投机性较强的角落里，赌场却热闹非凡。【原文：The stock market is having a sleepy trading session Tuesday ahead of Wednesday’s critical inflation data. But in the more obscure, speculative corners of the investing world the casino is rocking.】

item.title: 下一篇 美国银行称日本可能通过出售国债进行干预
item.description: 据美国银行（Bank of America Corp）称，日本未来为支持日元而采取的任何外汇干预措施都可能涉及动用其持有的美国国债。【原文：Any future foreign-exchange intervention by Japan to support the yen would likely involve tapping its holdings of US Treasuries, according to Bank of America Corp.】

item.title: 据说 EQT 支持的 Waystar 将在美国首次公开募股中寻求高达 10 亿美元的资金
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Waystar Holding Corp. 正在寻求在美国首次公开募股中筹集多达 10 亿美元的资金。【原文：Waystar Holding Corp. is seeking to raise as much as $1 billion in its US initial public offering, according to people familiar with the matter.】
